translations: n.肉豆蔻；肉豆蔻种子中的核仁

sentences.sentence: So smart that it was said they could sell wooden, meaning false, nutmegs to strangers.
sentences.translation: 据说，他们精明到可以把木头疙瘩当肉豆蔻卖给陌生人。

sentences.sentence: Do amazing skill combos, trickshots, nutmegs, pannas, ground moves and other skills to beat the opponents to advance in the SkillTwins World.
sentences.translation: 做出令人惊叹的技能连击，trickshots，肉豆蔻，pannas，地面移动等技能击败对手在SkillT wins世界前进。
